text: Yoshiwara is a famous yūkaku (red-light district) in Tokyo. Yoshiwara may also refer to: * Yoshiwara, Shizuoka, a city in eastern Shizuoka Prefecture * Yoshiwara Station, Fuji, Shizuoka Prefecture, Japan * Yoshiwara (1920 film), a German silent film * Yoshiwara (1937 film), a French drama film
title: Yoshiwara (disambiguation)
